Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class CardView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.CardView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CardView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a view of the Card class to the Client. It implements serializable so that it can be serialized in the messages that client and server exchange: this way, the client won't have access to the Model objects.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • CardView

      public CardView​(Card card)
      CardView constructor. CardView attributes are set to the values of the same attributes of the Card Object received as an argument.
      Parameters:
      card - the Card represented by this CardView

    • CardView

      public CardView​(java.lang.String god, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description)
      CardView constructor. CardView attributes are set to the values received as arguments.
      Parameters:
      god - the God associated with the Card this CardView represents
      title - the title of the Card this CardView represents
      description - the description of the Card this CardView represents
